title: Modern Belfast City Break with Easy Access to the Titanic Quarter
description: Stay close to Belfast City's popular sights when you stay at the ideally located Holiday Inn Express Belfast City, an IHG Hotel. Walk to the Grand Opera House, just a 15-minute stroll from the hotel, or hop over to the city's best bars and restaurants, just a couple of minutes walk away, or venture further afield to the Titanic Exhibition Centre that's a 15-minute drive away. Return to your hotel, where you can enjoy breakfast in the dining area, or opt for a glass of wine at the open-plan lounge bar.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Belfast City, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 106 University Street, Belfast, BT7 1HP United Kingdom

title: Belfast Forest Hideaway near River Lagan
description: Located in an enchanting setting where the forest meets the river, Crowne Plaza Belfast, an IHG Hotel, is the ideal escape from reality. When you're not exploring the lush parkland or making tracks to the CBD, make use of the hotel's soothing health facilities: cool off in the swimming pool or enjoy a pampering massage at the spa. When it comes to dining, the onsite restaurant and bar offers something for everyone, from seasonal dishes to imaginative cocktails served by a cosy fireplace.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Belfast, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 117 Milltown Road, Belfast BT8 7XP, United Kingdom

title: Trendy Escape in the Heart of Belfast City
description: Belfast is brimming with history, art, gastronomic mastery, and nightlife, with the Holiday Inn Belfast City Centre, an IHG Hotel perfectly situated in the heart of it all. Discover the lively city streets lined with a charming combination of historic and new architecture, home to sleek bars, fashion-forward boutiques, and a bustling restaurant scene. The art and culture of the city is at your doorstep with the annual Belfast Film Festival bringing in thousands of film buffs over the summer season.
location_description: Holiday Inn Belfast City Centre, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 40 Hope Street, Belfast, BT12 5EE, United Kingdom
